issue.title: gazebo crashing with Intel graphics card while running baxter simulator

content.raw:
Thanks @aktanwani for the detailed description of the problem. I usually do my tests with an Intel integrated graphic card (Intel HD4000 vs yours an HD5500) and most of the times it can work well. Some other questions:

 * It would be highly interesting to give the simulation a try in newer gazebo versions, like 4.x or 5.x.
 * It is gazebo failing on some other worlds, or only when trying to run the Baxter?
 * Is there any open repository that I can use to reproduce the problem?
